nodes.text: Sondarr Base was a base on the world of Sondarr, that served as a headquarters for the mercenary organization Star's Nova.

Sondarr Base was located in the Lunnes Wastes, on Sondarr. Inside, it had a hangar bay, a command center, training facilities and a power generator. Star's Nova stored most of its equipment in Sondarr Base, although only about 100 people were permanently based there.
